data.title: WIP Festival 2023
data.text:
When a weather change occurs, rain irrigates the arid planet and gradually floods it. In the water springs an ecosystem, populated by giant carnivorous tadpoles.

BARBEROUSSE FILMS is an independent production company created in Paris in 2015 by François Martin Saint Léon. Since its creation, BARBEROUSSE FILMS has produced around ten films including those by Pierre Léon, Pascale Bodet, Pascal Cervo, Momoko Seto and Joachim Hamou. BARBEROUSSE FILMS produces short and feature-length fiction or documentary films and virtual reality experiences. The productions have been selected and awarded at major festivals in France and internationally (Locarno, Vienna, Seville, Belo-Horizonte, Mardel-Plata, Tokyo, Sheffield, Melbourne, Montreal, Rotterdam, Melbourne, Taipei, Marseille …). BARBEROUSSE FILMS productions are distributed in cinemas, broadcast on television and on video on demand platforms (VOD / SVOD).
